casebody.data:
TEAGUE
v.
NCDOT et al. No. 281P06-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2008. Tina Krasner, Assistant Attorney General, for NCDOT. C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State. Prior report: 177 N.C.App. 215 , 628 S.E.2d 395 . The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of June 2008 by Petitioner Temporary Stay: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of June 2008." EDMUNDS, J., recused.
